name: World of Warplanes

task.exclude_processes: explorer.exe rpcss.exe services.exe winedevice.exe plugplay.exe WargamingGameUpdater.exe WoWPLauncher.exe
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- game: http://redirect.wargaming.net/WGC/Wargaming_Game_Center_Install_WoWP_EU.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Games/World_of_Warplanes/WoWPLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts win10
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /VERYSILENT /CLOSEAPPLICATIONS
    description: Installing World of Warplanes
    exclude_processes: explorer.exe rpcss.exe services.exe winedevice.exe plugplay.exe
      WargamingGameUpdater.exe WoWPLauncher.exe
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1920x1080
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
